4. RATES FOR 2025¶

4.1. CANADA / QUEBEC PENSION PLAN (QPP / CPP)¶

Employee contribution rate 5.95% 5.95% Employer contribution rate 5.95% 5.95% Maximum pensionable earnings $66,600 $66,600 Basic exemption

Anual $3,500 $3,500 Monthly (12) $291.67 $291.67 Weekly (52) $673.08 $673.08 Weekly (53) $634.91 $634.91 Semi-monthly (24) $1,250.00 $1,250.00 Bi-weekly (26) $1,346.15 $1,346.15

Maximum contribution $3,754.45 $3,754.45
